endpoints: This release contains “forward-looking statements” that reflect the Company’s current expectations as to its ability to consummate the Offers, including the timing, size, pricing or other terms of the Offers. The factors that could cause the Company’s actual results to vary materially from those anticipated or expressed in any forward-looking statement are described in the Company’s most recent Form 10-K and subsequent Securities and Exchange Commission filings, and include the ability to complete the Offers. The Company disclaims any obligation or intent to update the forward-looking statements to reflect events or circumstances after the date of this release.
